entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • osr stress arm64 - coreclr_initialize failed #77066
    8.0.0
  • Hidden version files in .NET runtime installation #77061
  • NativeAOT: Custom runtime without AppContext class throw #77054
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer overloads accepting non-generic JsonTypeInfo #77051
    8.0.0
  • VS Code failed to run .NET runtime on Ubuntu 20.04 on WSL2 #77048
  • [Mono][Arm64]Improve the performance of microbenchmarks #77046
    8.0.0
  • Blazor: Querying generic attributes does not work in Mono #77047
  • System.AccessViolationException when using current version (68.2.0.9) of Microsoft.ICU.ICU4C.Runtime with .NET SDK v6.0.402 #77045
    6.0.x
  • [FullPGO] Regressions in LinqBenchmarks due to delegate GDV #77041
    8.0.0
  • Query on Migrating from Newtonsoft to System.Text.Json #77040

Closed

  • Changing DateTimeFormatInfo.TimeSeparator on some cultures doesn't work because DateTimeFormatInfo's time patterns doesn't use ':' #77037
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #43915
    Future
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Private.Xml.Tests - GENERAL_FAILURE #76134
    7.0.x
  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't with Visual Studio 17.3 #77053
  • Perf regressions in Perf_Matrix benchmarks #59415
    7.0.0
  • Streaming HttpContent and ReadAsStreamAsync #31316
    Future
  • String.StartsWith("\0") behavior change between .NET Framework and .NET 6 #77050
  • [API Proposal]: Add new overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync method in HttpContentJsonExtensions #72103
    8.0.0
  • CS8352 Cannot use variable 'result' in this context because it may expose referenced variables outside of their declaration scope #77036
  • File.Copy leads to deadlocks on Ubuntu Linux #76999
  • Throughput for Server workloads on ARM64 is comparable to x64 #70530
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Emit ICorProfiler ModuleLoadFinished for dynamic modules #77068
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Filter out addresses that are not in bookkeeping range during background promote #77067
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix loading app-local ICU #77065
    area-System.Globalization
  • Fixed a typo in a variable name #77062
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing new workload manifest targets changes #77058
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Updated NugetProjectModelVersion from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2. #77057
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Modify __int64 definition in PAL to match the OS definition #77056
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • NativeAOT: remove some headers that are not needed #77042
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix failing `EvaluateBrowsableRootHidden` #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove non-deterministic signals from debugger tests. #77038
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make sure all heap segment fields are populated in the DAC #77035
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: minor cleanup of some inlining methods #77009
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #76743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Align env var lookup in clrconfig and jithost #77025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "[wasm] Run System.Runtime tests in a deterministic order to w… #77063
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #77021
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync #75989
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][ppc64le] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76990
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Try changing alignment #76451
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host
  • Use BitOperations in more places #76933
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2020499 #76907
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [PERF] Fix Linux arm64 AOT ROOTFS_DIR missing (Less Impactful) #77027
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use DOTNET_ variables in tests #76997
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #76940
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Leverage the shipping, roslyn based ApiCompat in dotnet/runtime #73263
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE]: System.Net.Mail Test Failure Fix testing #76361
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fixes issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command line #76965
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add cecil as a dependency of the runtime #77029
    area-Infrastructure
  • Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76955
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Trim trailing SP and HTAB for header value on HTTP/1.1 #77030
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Don't copy coreclr version of coreclr and SPCL to core_root when targeting mono #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Implement missing NAOT support (and fix garbage values passed to JIT in expandRawHandleIntrinsic) #76996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, 7.0.x
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [JIT] x86 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Avoid runtime "atomic write" check in ConcurrentDictionary for shared generics #77005
    area-System.Collections
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Check if interval interferes with the call #76904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP] statically linking GC PAL #76985
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • #76596 update icu version for norwegian culture #77003
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #76942
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #77026
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Clean near unmaintainable parallel logic 53593 #76949
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAot web core api custom error return code error System.Reflection.MissingMetadataException #2037
  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: How do CSE vars get their definition #2036

PullRequests

Merged

  • Conservative GC reporting for suspended green threads #2022
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge string.empty optimisation #2039
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: make sure address is an i8* for memset #2035

Updated

  • Green thread objects #2023

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hidden files in the .NET SDK #28598
  • dotnet test does not find any tests if environment variable is set that ends with dll #28592
  • ResolvePackageAssets throws IndexOutOfRangeException when reading its cache #28577

Closed

  • Generic T where T : enum should not show warning #28586

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable codeql in servicing #28605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2021301 #28597
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28595
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #28470
    Area-Infrastructure, Priority:0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #28469
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #28468
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28551
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28558
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28483
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2020853 #28581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • The loc build changes didn't flow to main so going directly. #28552
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Adding some loc locked tags #28553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #28333
    Area-Tools
  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect var type deduction #64747
  • Don't offer non-abstract and non-virtual statics after type parameter #64733
  • New `prop` semantic snippet doesn't place cursor where expected #64731

Closed

  • Speculative semantic model produces different behavior for local functions #24135
    Compiler.Next
  • Speculation within attributes on local functions is broken #60801
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33014.230 #64748
  • LSIF fails to generate for some projects with "Could not load file or assembly `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp, Version=4.0.0.0".... #64491
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Read required project properties from evaluation data #64749
    Area-IDE
  • Recover from the Exception in IdleProcessor #64746
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove support for recoverable syntax trees #64739
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed prop snippet caret position #64732
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Cache indices against our PEReference object, not the underlying metadata ID #64742
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade our compiler to 4.4.0-2.final #64745
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Speculative semantic model - create child member models for attributes and parameter default values. #64634
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64744
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64743
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add binding redirects for compiler binaries for the LSIF tool #64740
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update VS Platform NuGet package version #64667
    Area-Infrastructure, OnDeckForQB
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use the required keyword and newer attributes #64738
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add new helper to allow more code to use consistent transformer #64736
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update solution using existing helper #64735
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Generate different DocumentIds for duplicate generators #64729
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64727
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64730
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure we include a projectId along with our ProjectChanged notification #64722
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB, Next
  • Correct package names in PublishData.json #64734
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64728
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not use CWT for Task<Compilation> #64623
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix ArgumentOutOfRangeException from using speculative semantic model #64691
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Write lsp logs to xunit output during tests #64689
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Skip csharpsourcegenerators.findreferencesforfilewithdefinitioninsourcegeneratedfile #64726
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64750
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - constructor snippet #64489
    Area-IDE
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Name anonymous delegate parameters #64604
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Track local constant usage in attributes #64660
    Area-Compilers
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Unskip CSharpSoruceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile test #64626
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hidden version files in .NET aspnetcore installation #44559
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #44556
  • In custom middleware, there are no route data values #44554
  • Publish .NET Core app with shared project with spaces in name. Misleading error message: net6.0\browser-wasm\ref or net6.0\win-x64\ref not found #44552
  • AuthZ: Add IRequirementData #44551
    8.0-preview1
  • Follow up on: UseEndpoints behaves differently in Development and Production env #44545
  • Weird Blazor WASM bug: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] Unhandled exception rendering component: Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException #44542
  • Link generation for actions in areas adds the area as an url parameter instead of as part of the path #44541
  • (Blazor) Navigating to a non-existing page does not call Dispose() on IDisposable component #44539
  • Json parsing error behaviors control in Minimal Api #44538
  • Kestrel: Support for multiple transports, side-by-side #44537
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add StringSyntax formats throughout source code #44535

Closed

  • coverlet.msbuild not working of .net 7 #44553
  • `[directory]` not shown in installation bundle help #44167
  • Fine-grained override of `OAuthHandler.HandleRemoteAuthenticateAsync` #44424
  • Assumption about relative path for project files #44224
  • blazor-hotreload.js breaks offline service worker when running from visual studio. #44487
  • UseEndpoints behaves differently in Development and Production env #44491
  • 'dotnet publish' does not publish wwwroot when Blazor project is a dependency #44519
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rtm.22510.17] Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Converting circular structure to JSON when opening a new tab #44521
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #44517

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
  • Fix documentation for .AddIdentityResources() #44560
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Remove temporary allocations from Identity #44557
    Perf, area-identity
  • Add CompositeFormat StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #44555
    community-contribution
  • Override Send in TestHost.ClientHandler #44550
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Feature/inform when disabling http2 #44543
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • add ppc64le arch to crossgen2 not available list #44536
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Increase timeouts for template tests #44558
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Increase timeouts for template tests #44549
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2021196 #43956
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix request delegate analyzer error on null return type #44534
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security, blog-candidate
  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Skip template update check in template tests #44532
    area-mvc

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize eeheap presentation for regions #3462
    sos

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Too much spacing between two rows with a FlexLayout on Android. #10698
  • Background is not recognized or is not accessible - breaks XAML Hot Reload #10696
  • RadioButton content not aligned to the ellipse on Windows (work on Android) #10694
  • Build MAUI library targeting .NET6 should have a Platforms folder (like for Windows, Android, iOS, Tizen) #10689
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Visual Studio 2022 crashes after starting creating a file new project for MAUI #10688
  • Japanese Hiragana to Kanji converting not works in Searchbar Android #10683
    Backlog

Closed

  • Can't add Map Pins #10180
  • Read SMS in MAUI (on Android / iOS) #10217
    Backlog
  • Random Android.Util.AndroidRuntimeException Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its views. #10618
  • What can i say #10682
  • .gitignore / "obj" folder corrupt program #10685
  • How can I troubleshoot why my android device stops appearing in the VS 2022 list of 'Android Local Devices' #10548

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't use the main thread for networking #10697
    7.0
  • [net6] Some fixes for tests #10695
  • Add guidance how to test code documentation #10692
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22513.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22514.1 #10690
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Tests] Ignore tests runs for Core/Controls/Blazor on 12.4 and Android API25 #10693
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10636
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10681
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix WinAppSDK 12 Additional resources keys #10680
    platform/windows 🪟

Updated

  • Revert "[Windows] Fix default corner radius on Button" #10664
  • Update to WinAppSDK 1.2 #10678
  • [Android] Fix Frame opacity #10672
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
  • [Core] Changes disposing items in CollectionView #10590
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Set data context on MauiDoneAccessoryView. #10677
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidCastException on wrong property type in entity #29357
  • The change of a navigation to a new instance and removing the old instance throws an Exception #29356
  • FromSqlRaw throws Exception when querying all objects that contain a certain string property in a json array column #29355
  • Database already exists error with localdb when Running uniitests #29354
  • Cannot run `dotnet ef migrations script --no-build` simultaneously. #29352

Closed

PullRequests

Created

  • Update DailyBuilds.md #29362
  • Update file "getting and building the code.md" #29361
  • Use C# 11 raw SQL literals for all SQL baselines #29350
    tell-mode

Updated

  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346
